component.name: SystemTransfer
component.metadata_license: A permissive license for this metadata, e.g. "FSFAP" + Update the SPDX tags above!

description.p: Transfer your files to another computer
This app provides a simple way to transfer your files to a new computer for example.
It uses rsync to transfer the data once a connection is established (or at least it probably will when I write that bit)
